author: Simon Difford
description: Inspired by the witch on a broomstick on the label of Monkey 47's mint sauce and honey edition (Strega is Italian for witch) and named with a thought to British pub names.
name: Witch & Broomstick
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY shake (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
